detail_desc: Shorter lace top with cap sleeves and a concealed zip and slit at the back. Lined.
5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and flared hems. The jeans are made partly from organic cotton.
Wide, V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
All-in-one suit in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood. Zip down the front, front pockets, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and long legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Chunky-knit jumper in sturdy cotton with ribbed sections around the shoulders and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Calf-length dress in a viscose crêpe weave with decorative pompom trims. Braided detail around the neckline and an opening at the top with tasselled, twisted ties. Wide, 3/4-length sleeves with narrow cuffs. Unlined.
Sun hat in a cotton weave with ties under the chin. Lined. Width of brim 4.5 cm.

Short, A-line dress in a crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, and gathered seams at the waist and hem creating tiers for added width. Sleeveless jersey underdress.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy viscose weave with broderie anglaise. Smocking at the top,long sleeves and elasticated cuffs with a flounce.
Trainers in imitation leather with a zip at the front. Mesh linings, cotton canvas insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Short skater skirt in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist and visible zip at the back. Unlined.
Ankle-length twill trousers with a regular waist with elastication at the back, pleats at the front and a detachable tie belt. Side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Longer V-neck jumper in a soft textured knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a low-cut back.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif in a relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Longer-style cardigan in a rib knit containing some wool with a drawstring hood, welt side pockets and a zip down the front. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless dresses in patterned cotton jersey with a seam at the top and gathered skirt.
Bucket hat in woven fabric with eyelets at the sides and a cotton lining.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Shorts in soft cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket with a button.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Double-layered hat in a fine knit containing glittery threads with an embroidered motif on the turned-up hem and faux fur pompoms on top.
Pyjama top and shorts in soft satin. V-neck cami top with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and lace at the top. Short shorts with narrow elastication at the waist and lace-trimmed hems.
Blouse in satin with a sheen. Deep V-neck, covered buttons down the front, and long sleeves with pleats on the shoulders and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Pleated waist with a wide lace trim.
Blouse in a patterned weave with a frilled collar, opening and button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Jersey lining.
Jacket in washed denim with hard-worn details, a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, buttons at the cuffs and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem.
Short dress in soft cotton jersey with a trim around the neckline and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Straight-cut, V-neck T-shirt in soft jersey made from pima cotton containing some silk in a relaxed style.
Plastic bottle with a screw top with an adjustable spout and internal straw. Size 7.5x7.5x21 cm. Capacity 650 ml.
Ankle-length trousers in soft jersey with an elasticated waist, side pockets and gently tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Long, 5-pocket shorts in stretch twill with a regular waist, slightly lower crotch and zip fly and button.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Printed jersey sports shorts in a sturdy cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and slightly lower crotch. Discreet side pockets and flap cargo pockets.
Knee-length shorts in sweatshirt fabric with running tights in jersey. Elasticated waist, side pockets and a back pocket.
Long T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Cap in patterned cotton jersey with an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Waist bag with a zip at the top and an adjustable strap with a plastic fastener. Lined. Size 5x12x24 cm.

Windproof gloves in jersey and fleece with reinforced palms and an adjustable hook and loop tab at the wrists. The tops of the thumb and index finger are in touchscreen-compatible material. D-ring and hook to clip the gloves together.
Trainers in imitation leather with lacing at the front, mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Sleeveless, ankle-length dress in soft jersey with a V-neck at the back, ties at the back of the neck and slits in the sides.
Round-necked T-shirt in premium cotton jersey.
Top and leggings with a print motif. Longer top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Leggings in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Dress in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket and long sleeves with a tab and button. Pockets in the side seams, a detachable imitation suede belt and a rounded hem.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose weave. Elasticated waist with a small frill trim and sewn-on bow with tassels. Side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Jumper in a soft wool knit containing some cashmere with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons down the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Slides with a faux fur strap and moulded rubber soles.
Sleeveless top in nylon jersey with a double-layer at the top for easier nursing access. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Tunic in woven fabric with a collar, button placket, chest pocket with a button, pockets in the side seams and long sleeves with a tab and button. Braided imitation suede belt and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (sizes 1½-2Y with normal sequins).
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist that is elasticated at the back. Fake welt back pockets and slim legs with creases.
Balconette bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide hem.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Pre-tied bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.

Cropped sports top in fast-drying functional fabric designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Integral bra with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and covered elastication at the hem.

Calf-length dress in jacquard-weave viscose with a round neckline, small opening at the front and concealed zip at the back. Long, wide sleeves, a seam and knot detail at the waist and a wrapover skirt. Unlined.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with a funnel collar, kangaroo pocket, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
3/4-length leggings in stretch cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Ankle-length suit trousers in a woven viscose blend with an elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Cropped top in soft cotton jersey with concealed elastication at the front of the top.
Shorts in printed sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Soft brushed inside.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, wrapover funnel collar, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in supersoft, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, and straight hems.

Blouse in a soft weave with a collar, opening at the front with concealed buttons at the top, and a pleat at the front to create a gentle drape. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a top, pair of shorts and pair of tights. Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with frill trim over the shoulders and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Shorts in a jacquard weave containing glittery threads with elastication at the back of the waistband, a fake fly with a press-stud, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Tights in a fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Scarf in a soft, airy weave with fringes on the short sides.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Sports vest top in ribbed fast-drying functional fabric made from recycled polyester with short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.

Long, sleeveless dress in crisp cotton poplin with narrow, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a double-layered frill trim and wide smocking at the top for a close fit that relaxes at the hips. Voluminous, lined skirt.
Short dress in soft, patterned jersey with a scallop-edged V-neck, decorative buttons at the front, long sleeves and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Long tunic in airy chiffon with broderie anglaise. V-neck with buttons at the front and short sleeves with a drawstring at the hems for a gently draped effect. Seams with a crocheted band at the waist and over the knees. Open at the bottom. Unlined.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.

Short dress in a rustle weave. Straight cut at the top with narrow, detachable shoulder straps, a concealed silicone trim at the top, and a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening at one side. Smocking and a sewn-on bow at the back, a gathered seam at the waist for added width and soft draping, and pockets in the side seams. Partly lined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and a frill at the sides.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist, detachable tie belt, zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Metal watch with an adjustable strap in nylon with a metal buckle. Width of strap 2 cm, total length 24.5 cm. Diameter of watch 3.5 cm.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a stand-up collar.
High-waisted, fitted skirt.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
